Changelog for collective.portlet.dropdownbox

    (name of developer listed in brackets)

collective.portlet.dropdownbox - 0.1 Unreleased

    - Setup an adapter for building each link item as a dic, can be reused 
    from the interfaces.ILinksBuilder and helper.CollectionLinksBuilder etc. 
      [pelle_]

    - Lets benefit of all the goodies from plone.portlet.static:
     omit-border feature, wysiwyg field and css class naming feature.
      [pelle_]

    - Initial package structure.
      [zopeskel]
